title.rendered: Harrison Carloss takes on yet more top talent

content.rendered:
We are excited to announce that Harrison Carloss has taken on some sparkling new talent to add to their team of designers, developers, inventors, strategists, artists and storytellers.

Molly Boston, Account Executive

Molly Boston joins as an Account Executive, adding even more capability to our mighty account management team. She comes from digital marketing agency iProspect (part of Dentsu Aegis Network), with expertise in SEO, PPC and all things digital marketing. In her previous role, Molly has worked with a variety of exciting clients, including large multi-national brands, which has helped to develop and diversify her knowledge.

Stefan Tutuianu, Junior Developer

Meanwhile, Stefan Tutuianu comes in as a Junior Developer to bolster the agency’s in-house digital capabilities. Stefan is excited to be working towards becoming a fully trained Web Developer and gaining experience while supporting Harrison Carloss clients. He has already proved himself to be a master of building websites and emails – as well as flexing his skills as the hottest office DJ outside of Ibiza.

Team Harrison Carloss

Just a year ago, we became part of My Clever Group, changed our name from HCL to Harrison Carloss, and began a restructure in every part of our operation.

With 40 years of creative success behind us, we completely transformed our services right across creative, web and digital, to reinvigorate our full and comprehensive range of marketing services.

With an impressive new line-up of specialist skills and an inspired creative squad that has doubled in size, our specialist disciplines that include digital design, web development, SEO, PPC and social media expertise can now offer existing and new clients an unmatched range of skills and client service.

Our MD Adam comments: “We are delighted to welcome Molly and Stefan to the team. As Harrison Carloss goes from strength to strength, it continues to recruit the very best talent to deliver excellent results for clients.”

Interested in joining?

We’re an innovative and creative gang, passionate about launching and growing brands. Check out our vacancies page for the latest roles at Harrison Carloss.
